## ILineAccessor interface

Interface to access lines. Allows read access for some important attributes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ILineAccessor 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color](./harp-mapview.ilineaccessor.color.md) | THREE.Color \| undefined \| Array&lt;THREE.Color \| undefined&gt; | Get the color from materials. |
|  [geometryType](./harp-mapview.ilineaccessor.geometrytype.md) | [GeometryType](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrytype.md) | Hint for the original type of geometry. |
|  [renderOrder](./harp-mapview.ilineaccessor.renderorder.md) | number | Render order. |
|  [width](./harp-mapview.ilineaccessor.width.md) | number \| undefined | Get the width. May have to be reconstructed from triangulated line mesh. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [clear()](./harp-mapview.ilineaccessor.clear.md) | Clear the object from the mesh. |
|  [getVertices()](./harp-mapview.ilineaccessor.getvertices.md) | Get vertices from the object. |
|  [isLineAccessor()](./harp-mapview.ilineaccessor.islineaccessor.md) | Helper for function <code>isLineAccessor</code>. |
